external_references.description: Kaspersky Lab's Global Research & Analysis Team. (2018, October 15). Octopus-infested seas of Central Asia. Retrieved November 14, 2018.

description: [Nomadic Octopus](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0133) attempted to make [Octopus](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0340) appear as a  Telegram Messenger with a Russian interface.(Citation: Securelist Octopus Oct 2018)
